title: "Research"

My research spans five interconnected themes, united by a commitment to rigorous methodology, patient-centered design, and translational impact.

---

## Autonomic Disorders

Understanding the mechanisms and improving the diagnosis and management of autonomic nervous system dysfunction in children and adults.

::: {.research-projects}
- **Autonomic Lab** — Core research laboratory for autonomic function testing, including cardiovascular autonomic reflex testing, tilt-table studies, and quantitative sudomotor axon reflex testing
- **ARRO Study** — Investigating autonomic regulation and outcomes
- **MRI POTS** — Neuroimaging study of postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome
- **PWS ANS** — Autonomic dysfunction in Prader-Willi Syndrome
- **Long COVID MRI Study** — Characterizing autonomic and neurological sequelae of post-acute COVID-19
- **ANS Bayesian Analysis** — Developing Bayesian statistical methods for autonomic data
:::

---

## Rare Pediatric Diseases

Advancing diagnosis and treatment for children with rare neurological and metabolic conditions through clinical trials and collaborative networks.

::: {.research-projects}
- **TaurineLC** — Phase II clinical trial of taurine supplementation for long-chain fatty acid oxidation disorders (LCFAO), including a pediatric extension study
- **RareKidsCan** — National rare pediatric diseases research network building collaborative infrastructure for multi-site rare disease trials
- **Gene Therapy Initiative** — Emerging gene therapy research in pediatric neurological conditions
- **CLCN Pediatric Taurine Trial** — Engagement with Canadian Lifelong Conditions Networks for pediatric taurine trial expansion
:::

---

## Headache & Migraine

Clinical and epidemiological research in pediatric and adult headache disorders, including clinical trials and real-world evidence studies.

::: {.research-projects}
- **AbbVie Atogepant Trial** — Clinical trial of atogepant for migraine prevention
- **Pfizer Rimegepant Trial** — Clinical trial of rimegepant for migraine treatment
- **Botox Chronic Migraine RWE** — Real-world evidence study of botulinum toxin for chronic migraine
- **MRI Migraine** — Neuroimaging in migraine
- **Cochrane Migraine Systematic Review** — Systematic review of migraine interventions
- **Enrichment Trial Designs** — Methods manuscript on enrichment designs for headache trials
:::

---

## Clinical Trials Methodology

Developing and validating novel methods for designing, conducting, and analyzing clinical trials — with a focus on efficiency, adaptive designs, and equity.

::: {.research-projects}
- **SHIELD Study** — Clinical methodology study
- **MOSAIC Study** — Multi-site methodology study
- **Diversity in Clinical Trials** — Research on equity, diversity, and inclusion in trial recruitment and design
- **AI-Enhanced Clinical Trial Data Strategy** — Developing AI approaches to improve trial data quality and efficiency
- **Enrichment Trial Designs** — Methodological framework for enrichment strategies in clinical trials
- **CIHR Grant Success Analysis** — Analyzing factors that predict grant success at CIHR
:::

---

## Health Data & AI

Leveraging health data platforms, AI/NLP tools, and analytics to accelerate research and improve institutional decision-making.

::: {.research-projects}
- **PrairiesCan Health Data Platform** — Provincial health data platform initiative
- **Data Alberta Initiative** — Provincial data strategy for health research
- **AegisText / Janus** — AI-powered text analysis and NLP pipeline for clinical documents
- **Bayesian Deep Learning** — Exploring Bayesian neural network methods for clinical prediction
- **CIHR FDD Analysis** — Analysis of CIHR Funding Decisions Database
:::
